content:
Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk, Air Force Commander, reported on the morning of March 31, 2024 that the Air Defense knocked down 9 winged missiles X-101/X-555 and 9 shock UAV Shahd-136/131 Russian occupiers.

This is stated inmessageCommander.

On the night of March 31, 2024, Russian invaders attacked 14 winged missiles X-101/X-555 from Tu-95MS strategic aviation aircraft (St.uskiv district of Saratov region-Russian Primorsko-Akhtarsk-the Russian Federation, Crimea), Iskander-M ballistic missile (Crimea) and a managed aviation missile X-59 (TT of Zaporizhzhya region)

Air Air Force was involved in anti -aircraft missile units and fighter aircraft aircraft, mobile fire groups, radio electronic struggle products of Ukraine.

As reported by the Armyinform, the loss of the enemyexceeded442 thousand invaders.
title: Ukraine's air defense has knocked down 9 rockets and 9 occupants of the occupiers
